RESUME_TIPS: Emphasize experience with **Large Language Models (LLMs)** and specify which ones you've worked with (e.g., LLaMA, Falcon).

Mention contributions to the **Hugging Face** ecosystem, highlighting any published models or repositories.

Fine tuning LLMs (e.g., LLaMA, Falcon, M.DESCRIPTION: Learn to fine-tune large language models for specific tasks, covering techniques like transfer learning and adaptation. The course focuses on practical applications and hands-on experience with popular LLMs.

Fine tuning LLMs (e.g., LLaMA, Falcon, M.COURSE_NAME: Large Language Models: From Zero to Hero
Fine tuning LLMs (e.g., LLaMA, Falcon, M.DESCRIPTION: This course covers the fundamentals of large language models, including pre-training, fine-tuning, and evaluation. It includes case studies and projects to solidify your understanding.
A comprehensive guide on how to train and fine-tune Large Language Models (LLMs). From beginner to advanced.

Benchmarking skills (e.g., MMLU, GSM8K,.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to rigorously evaluate machine learning models using various metrics and techniques. Includes hands-on exercises and case studies.
Covers the principles and methods for evaluating and selecting machine learning models. Topics include cross-validation, hyperparameter tuning, and performance metrics.
Focuses on the various metrics used to evaluate machine learning models, including regression, classification, and ranking metrics. Gain an understanding of model evaluation.

Quantization techniques (GPTQ, AWQ, QLoR.COURSE_NAME: Model Compression with Quantization and Pruning
Quantization techniques (GPTQ, AWQ, QLoR.DESCRIPTION: Explore various model compression techniques, including quantization and pruning. The course covers practical implementation and trade-offs.
Learn advanced techniques for optimizing deep learning models, including quantization, pruning, and knowledge distillation. The course includes hands-on projects and case studies.
A deep dive into quantization techniques used to optimize deep learning models for deployment on resource-constrained devices.

Training and optimizing multi-modal mode.DESCRIPTION: Explore the principles and techniques for building multi-modal machine learning models. The course covers vision, language, and audio modalities.
Learn how to apply deep learning techniques to multi-modal data. Topics include feature fusion, cross-modal attention, and transfer learning.
Covers the fundamentals of training and optimizing multi-modal models. From beginner to advanced.
